name: Role & Permissions Setup
description: Assign access roles to waiter, kitchen staff, supervisor, and cashier.

tasks.name: Define Roles
tasks.prompt: Create and assign the following roles: Waiter (access to `waiter_order`), Kitchen Staff (access to `station_display`), Supervisor (access to `table_display`), Cashier (uses native POS). Set Role Permissions for each Doctype and Web Page.
